about.name: Aya Abdelmoneim
about.title: Flutter Instructor | Mobile Application Developer
about.summary: Flutter Instructor and Mobile Application Developer with experience building production-ready mobile applications across healthcare, education, and community platforms. I specialize in Clean Architecture, state management, and writing maintainable Flutter code aligned with real market needs. I enjoy mentoring junior developers and preparing students for professional Flutter roles.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science & Artificial Intelligence

experience.desc: Lead hands-on Flutter training, teaching MVVM architecture, Bloc state management, RESTful APIs, and production-ready app development. Mentored students in GitHub portfolio building and technical interview prep.
todo: Designed and delivered a complete Flutter curriculum covering Dart, UI, state management, Firebase, and REST APIs.
Increased student project completion rates by 40% through hands-on labs and real-world assignments.
Guided students in building production-ready e-commerce apps using MVVM architecture.
Conducted code reviews to enforce Clean Code and best practices.
Mentored students in portfolio development and technical interview preparation.
Supported transition from academic learning to industry-ready Flutter skills.

experience.desc: Developed and optimized healthcare and education apps, including the Mighty Education App. Implemented authentication, admission workflows, and scalable architecture using Riverpod and Flutter Flavors, collaborating closely with UI/UX and backend teams.
todo: Improved UI responsiveness and reduced testing issues by 25%.
Led full-cycle development of Mighty Education App with authentication and admission modules.
Built scalable, maintainable codebase with Riverpod and Flutter Flavors, improving build stability by 30%.
Collaborated with UI/UX and backend teams for pixel-perfect interfaces and API integration.
Applied Clean Code principles throughout development.

experience.desc: Built a scalable Flutter app using MVVM and Firebase, managing authentication and Firestore integration. Maintained version control with Git/GitHub and followed Clean Code practices.
todo: Developed scalable Flutter application with MVVM architecture and Firebase services.
Implemented real-time data sync and authentication features.
Maintained clean version control and code standards.
Gained experience in agile workflows and collaborative development.

experience.desc: Implemented features like pagination, Google Maps, and video player integration. Developed and published a Quran app with search, bookmarking, Tafsir integration, and offline support, improving overall team workflow.
todo: Implemented pagination, Google Maps, and video player features.
Developed and published Quran app with search, bookmarks, Tafsir, and offline support.
Contributed to improving development workflow and collaboration.

projects.name: ElBalto App
projects.desc: A telemedicine platform enabling live video consultations with certified doctors and delivering detailed medical reports.
responsibilities: Enhanced UI/UX for smoother, more user-friendly experience.
Fixed API issues including slow responses and data inconsistencies.
Collaborated with backend and QA teams to ensure stable releases.

projects.name: Care Connect Sudan
projects.desc: Official networking app for Sudan’s Ministry of Health, connecting healthcare professionals for consultations and discussions.
responsibilities: Improved UI/UX and resolved API integration issues.
Worked with cross-functional teams to deliver a scalable healthcare collaboration platform.
projects.techs: Flutter, REST API, Riverpod, Google Maps

projects.name: Mighty App
projects.desc: An education platform managing the full admission process for children, from nursery to final acceptance.
responsibilities: Developed authentication, application submission, and admission tracking features with smooth UI and API integration.
Collaborated with backend and product teams to ensure a reliable, user-friendly experience for parents.

projects.name: Quran App
projects.desc: A full-featured Quran app with advanced search, bookmarking, Tafsir integration, and offline support.
responsibilities: Built the app from scratch using Flutter with search, bookmark, and Tafsir features.
Published and maintained the app on Google Play, achieving consistent updates and bug fixes.

projects.name: Tasky App
projects.desc: A task management app to help users organize and prioritize tasks efficiently.
responsibilities: Implemented JWT authentication, QR code scanning, and task priority tracking using BLoC and Dio.
Designed a polished, user-friendly UI and integrated Shared Preferences for local storage.
